Title: Plugwise Library
Description: This is a library that enables users of the Plugwise energy saving system to communicate directly with the plugwise devices without using the Source Software. It is written in C# and provides an easy and simple way to control your devices.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a library that enables users of the Plugwise energy saving system to communicate directly with the plugwise devices without using the Source Software. It is written in C# and provides an easy and simple way to control your devices.
